Header.title: ANIMO
Header.paragraph: Animo enables users from all around the world to easily detected and analyze their emotional state, and offer practical way for coping with them

About.paragraph: We are team Animo, We created this app to help people become aware to there daily feelings and thoughts. With our innovative and uniqe methods, Animo users are able to access easly to their minds and understand better what they need and how they feel. You are welcome to explore our app and website and by that to explore yourself.
Why: Our site is accessible and user-friendly
We maintain the privacy of the user
There's no reason not to try ;)

Team.name: Yair Dana
content: I'm a 3rd year Computer Science Student at The Acadamic Collage of Tel Aviv, Yaffo.
Currently working as a Software Engineer at Wix.com.
In my free time I like to eat in good restaurants.
